title: Peppo Log
content:
[[iftags +component]]
+ Check Page Source for Code
[[/iftags]]
[[module CSS]]
.borderstylz {
    border: 1px solid #888;
    padding: 0.3em 0.7em;
    background-color: #EEE;
}

.cellstylz {
    border: 1px solid #888;
    padding: 0.7em;
    text-align:center;
}

.cellstylz2 {
    border: 1px solid #888;
    padding: 0.7em;
}
[[/module]]
[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; margin: 0px auto 30px auto;"]]
[[row]]
[[hcell class="borderstylz"]]
**Test #**
[[/hcell]]
[[hcell class="borderstylz"]]
**Subject**
[[/hcell]]
[[hcell class="borderstylz"]]
**Age**
[[/hcell]]
[[hcell class="borderstylz"]]
**Sex**
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell class="cellstylz"]]
{$test}
[[/cell]]
[[cell class="cellstylz"]]
{$name}
[[/cell]]
[[cell class="cellstylz"]]
{$age}
[[/cell]]
[[cell class="cellstylz"]]
{$sex}
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell class="borderstylz" colspan="4"]]
Method
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell class="cellstylz2" colspan="4"]]
{$method}
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell class="borderstylz" colspan="4"]]
Results
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell class="cellstylz2" colspan="4"]]
{$result}
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
author: PeppersGhost
